title: Summer Friday #1: Midterm Cram (ft. Katy Tur) | Summer Book Club
description:
The first episode of the "Late Night with Seth Meyers Podcast: Summer Fridays" limited series features a new podcast segment, Midterm Cram, co-hosted by “A Closer Look” supervising writer Sal Gentile and producer Henry Melcher. Their inaugural guest is reporter Katy Tur of NBC News and MSNBC. Her segment begins at 08:36.

You'll also hear summer reading recommendations from Late Night favorites Ellie Kemper, Phoebe Robinson and Celeste Ng starting at 33:24.

All music by The 8G Band.


LATE NIGHT ON SOCIAL
